page.title: 07DYKE SCHOOL
page.content: 61 pupils attend Dyke school.There are 7 age groups arranged in 3 classes.Primary 1/2 with 21 pupils,Primary 3/4/5 with 26 pupils andprimary 6/7 with 14 pupils.There are 4 classrooms.One of which is spare for music,resources and General Purposes.There is a hall used for eating and for sport and a prefabricated hut used for storage and a remedial unit.We travel to school by bus,car,bicycle or foot.We start school at 9.15am.Breaktime is at 10.45am when we play Dodgeball, skipping and chases.We get lunch at 12.30pm and break after.Primary 1/3 go home at 2.45pm and Primary 4/7 at 3.30pm.In the class we do such work as project English,Mathematics,PE,Swimmingand drama.We use things like listening centres,videos,TV,to do our work
